summary: This is an email from June 25, 2019, regarding an updated draft indictment of Jeffrey Epstein (JE). The sender asks the recipient to review the draft, noting that most edits from a third party (likely 'Wand') were accepted with minor tweaks. The email includes attachments of the clean draft and a redline comparison.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to by initials 'JE' in the email subject line; the draft indictment is about him.

events.title: Drafting of Epstein indictment
events.description: An updated draft indictment against Jeffrey Epstein is circulated via email for review.

keyFacts: An email dated June 25, 2019, discusses an updated draft indictment against Jeffrey Epstein (JE).
The draft incorporates edits from a third party, referred to as 'Wand' in the context.
The sender has accepted most of the third-party's edits with minor adjustments for consistency and clarity.
Attachments include a clean version of the draft indictment and a redline document comparing it to a previous version.
